name: Backflip
description:
Backflip is an exciting game that challenges you to perform as many back jumps as possible, pushing your acrobatic skills to the limit.

Your mission is to jump over high fences and obstacles, using your backflip skills to land safely and continue your journey to the end.As you progress through the game, the obstacles become increasingly difficult, requiring more precise jumps and perfect timing to clear. You'll need to use all of your acrobatic skills to make it to the end, performing impressive backflips and jumps to overcome any obstacle in your path.

Backflip is a game that rewards skill and determination, as you strive to achieve the highest score possible.
So, put on your acrobat suit and get ready to take on the challenge of Backflip, as you perform amazing back jumps and overcome any obstacle in your path!

Game features :
- Multiple levels
- Acrobatic jumps
- Unlimited time
